sentences.sContent: That is why we are continuing to invest in the fight against HIV/AIDS.
sentences.sContent_eng: That is why we are continuing to invest in the fight against HIV/AIDS.
sentences.sCn: 这就是为什么我们一直与艾滋病毒和艾滋病斗争的原因。

sentences.sContent: It is also uncertain at this stage whether or not the devices will test for HIV.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is also uncertain at this stage whether or not the devices will test for HIV.
sentences.sCn: 目前也还不确定，在现阶段这个装置是否将会用于检测艾滋病（HIV）。
